text:
See Adele's Tear-Jerking Performance of "Hello" at the Grammys 
Be still, our collective hearts. Getty By Lori Keong Feb 12, 2017 When the world first caught wind of Adele's scheduled performance at the Grammys (her fourth in Grammy history ), everyone who missed out on tickets to her 25 tour gave the news a resounding ï™‹. Riding high on *five* nominations for the evening (count 'em!) including the big "Album of the Year" trophy, the British songstress could have sung her grocery list, but instead she chose to take us down memory lane with an emotional rendition of "Hello" to open the ceremony. And though technical difficulties disrupted her set last year , she came back without missing a beat.
